title: Knight Rider Watchface
summary: Knight Rider Watchface for Android Wear
developerAddress: No.307, Yinming Rd., Kaohsiung City, Taiwan
description: The Knight Rider's watchface for your Android Wear.You can be the hero and talk to your supercar (OK GOOGLE) to defeat bad guys right away!* ONLY support Android Wear devices! (currently LG G Watch & Samsung Gear Live)* Currently only shows the 12-hours mode.* If PM is not shown up to the right of minutes, then it is AM time.* Support both LG G Watch & Samsung Gear Live.* Please feel free to contact me if any suggestion or feedback.* Comlink artwork used with permission from NRN Design, (C)2008 The Knight Rider Companion all rights reserved. (http://www.knightridercompanion.com)[Special Features] * ONLY available with some special customized supercar!* Lock opener* Audio/Video transmitter* Digital Camera* Electrical generation mode* Communicated with A.I. powered supercar.* Audio/Video playbacks* Homing beaconThanks,TaccoTap.
descriptionHTML:
The Knight Rider's watchface for your Android Wear.
You can be the hero and talk to your supercar (OK GOOGLE) to defeat bad guys right away!


* ONLY support Android Wear devices! (currently LG G Watch & Samsung Gear Live)
* Currently only shows the 12-hours mode.
* If PM is not shown up to the right of minutes, then it is AM time.
* Support both LG G Watch & Samsung Gear Live.
* Please feel free to contact me if any suggestion or feedback.
* Comlink artwork used with permission from NRN Design, (C)2008 The Knight Rider Companion all rights reserved. (http://www.knightridercompanion.com)


[Special Features]
* ONLY available with some special customized supercar!
* Lock opener
* Audio/Video transmitter
* Digital Camera
* Electrical generation mode
* Communicated with A.I. powered supercar.
* Audio/Video playbacks
* Homing beacon


Thanks,
TaccoTap.
comments: I'm having display issues I have a Sony SmartWatch 3... And it seems the time font is too big. The date and seconds don't fit. Can you help?
Doesn't work on my Moro. So disappointed No matter what I do this will not appear on my Moto smart watch
Used to love this watch face.  However, now the time shows up right shifted and down.  So all I can see is the time, but no date or seconds or AM/PM.  No battery icon either.
Not displaying properly I have an LG Urbane 2nd Edition and when I select this watchface the time and everything is off center and too big
Asus Zen has shifted display Asus Zen watch had time display offset making it difficult to read.
This watchface is absolutely brilliant.... When it works. I've got the LG G Watch, but it only wants to work half the time.
